tip: Worrying about things is like sitting in a rocking chair. It gives you something to do for a while but it won't get you any where.
The single raindrop never feels responsible for the flood.
Society progresses when old men plant trees whose shade they know they'll never sit under.
Don't speak like you're right. Listen like you're wrong.
Life is like lifting weight. It doesn't get easier, you get stronger.
Comparison is the thief of Joy.
Don't make decisions when you're angry, and don't make promises when you're happy.
You can't exercise your way out of a bad diet.
If you don't sacrifice for what you want, what you want becomes the sacrifice..
